person.persName: Noah Nichols Rice (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and private (C.S.A.))

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of James R. Rice and Elizabeth V. Nichols Rice. Married to Mary Ann Kevil Rice. Father of Sarah E. Rice, James Thomas Rice, Pernicia F. Rice, Lucy Rice, and Mary A. Rice. Resident of Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned eighteen enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in Princeton in 1860. Enlisted in the 10th Kentucky Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) on June 29, 1862. Reported as wounded in November 1862. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1863.
